00178 // - Implementation of template methods.
00179 
00180 template<class SEARCHMATCH>
00181 int
00182 SearchExpandItemRequestPacket::
00183 calcPacketSize(const vector<SEARCHMATCH*>& matches)
00184 {
00185    return ITEMS_START_POS + matches.size() * 12 + 4;
00186 }
00187 
00188 template<class SEARCHMATCH>
00189 SearchExpandItemRequestPacket::
00190 SearchExpandItemRequestPacket(const vector<SEARCHMATCH*>& matches,
00191                               uint32 mapID,
00192                               uint32 packetID,
00193                               uint32 reqID,
00194                               uint32 userData)
00195       : RequestPacket(  calcPacketSize(matches),
00196                         DEFAULT_PACKET_PRIO,
00197                         Packet::PACKETTYPE_SEARCHEXPANDITEMREQUEST,
00198                         packetID,
00199                         reqID,
00200                         mapID)
00201                        
00202 {
00203    int pos = USER_DEF_POS;
00204    incWriteLong( pos, userData );
00205    incWriteLong( pos, true); // EXPAND
00206    incWriteLong( pos, 0 ); // NbrItems
00207    int nbrAdded = 0;
00208    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < matches.size(); ++i ) {
00209       if ( matches[i]->getMapID() == mapID ) {
00210          nbrAdded++;
00211          incWriteLong(pos, i);
00212          incWriteLong(pos, matches[i]->getMapID());
00213          incWriteLong(pos, matches[i]->getItemID());
00214       }
00215    }
00216    writeLong(NBR_ITEMS_POS, nbrAdded);
00217    
00218    setLength(pos);
00219 }
00220 
00221 template<class SEARCHMATCH>
00222 SearchExpandItemRequestPacket::
00223 SearchExpandItemRequestPacket(const vector<SEARCHMATCH*>& matches,
00224                               const map<uint32,uint32>& translationMap,
00225                               uint32 mapID,
00226                               uint32 packetID,
00227                               uint32 reqID,
00228                               uint32 userData)
00229       : RequestPacket(  calcPacketSize(matches),
00230                         DEFAULT_PACKET_PRIO,
00231                         Packet::PACKETTYPE_SEARCHEXPANDITEMREQUEST,
00232                         packetID,
00233                         reqID,
00234                         mapID)
00235                        
00236 {
00237    int pos = USER_DEF_POS;
00238    incWriteLong( pos, userData );
00239    incWriteLong( pos, false ); // UNEXPAND
00240    incWriteLong( pos, matches.size() ); // Needs to be corrected after.
00241    int nbrAdded = 0;
00242    for ( uint32 i = 0; i < matches.size(); ++i ) {
00243       map<uint32, uint32>::const_iterator it =
00244          translationMap.find( matches[i]->getMapID());
00245       if ( it != translationMap.end() && it->second == mapID ) {
00246          nbrAdded++;
00247          incWriteLong(pos, i);
00248          incWriteLong(pos, matches[i]->getMapID());
00249          incWriteLong(pos, matches[i]->getItemID());
00250       }
00251    }
00252    writeLong(NBR_ITEMS_POS, nbrAdded);
00253    setLength(pos);
00254 }
